Solar_Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar_Panel.description: Provides solar power to the system.

physics_models.name: Power Generation
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_power(efficiency, irradiance, area):
    return efficiency * irradiance * area
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_power(efficiency, irradiance, area):
    return efficiency * irradiance * area
physics_models.coder_notes: Assumes constant irradiance and no temperature effects.

Solar_Panel.verification_plan: Test under varying irradiance conditions to validate power output.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: Stores energy for operation during low light conditions.

embodiment.description: Lightweight lithium-polymer battery for energy storage.

physics_models.name: Energy Storage
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_energy(capacity, voltage):
    return capacity * voltage
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_energy(capacity, voltage):
    return capacity * voltage
physics_models.coder_notes: Assumes constant voltage and no self-discharge.

Battery.verification_plan: Test energy storage capacity and discharge rate.

Filtration_Unit.name: Filtration Unit

embodiment.description: Lightweight ceramic filter for water purification.

physics_models.name: Flow Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_flow_rate(pressure_difference, viscosity, resistance):
    return pressure_difference / (viscosity * resistance)
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(pressure_difference, viscosity, resistance):
    return pressure_difference / (viscosity * resistance)
physics_models.coder_notes: Assumes laminar flow and constant viscosity.

Filtration_Unit.verification_plan: Test filtration efficiency and flow rate.

Control_Unit.name: Control Unit

physics_models.name: Processing Speed
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_processing_time(instructions, speed):
    return instructions / speed
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_processing_time(instructions, speed):
    return instructions / speed
physics_models.coder_notes: Assumes constant speed and no interruptions.

Control_Unit.verification_plan: Test processing speed and task handling.

physics_models.name: Mass Calculation
physics_models.coding_directives:
def calculate_mass(density, volume):
    return density * volume
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_mass(density, volume):
